title: [Self-Directed] Human Resource Management and Informal Learning Integration Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Introductory Human Resource Management Concepts and Organizational Learning Theory Comprehension
context.additional_context: Content optimized for smartphone-based learning for office/administrative professionals, including case studies using structural equation modeling analysis

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of core HRM practices (selective hiring, performance evaluation, etc.) on informal learning.
Learners can propose HRM strategies to facilitate informal learning within organizations.
Learners can apply structural equation modeling to analyze HRM-learning relationships.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
